feature: Side navigation buttons swap dashboard views
command: Manual: open index.html in a browser, click the 'Content OS' side button
expected: Content OS cards replace the home grid while the Content OS button gains the active outline
notes: Requires interactive browser to observe DOM state

feature: Header tabs toggle between Overview, Analytics, and Ads
command: Manual: click the Analytics tab in the sticky header
expected: Analytics tab highlights and the analytics canvas grid becomes visible

feature: Line, bar, and pie charts render inside their canvases
command: Manual: load the page and inspect the three canvases on the Home view
expected: Each canvas paints the corresponding chart with the provided dataset

feature: 30-day execution gantt timelines draw in Analytics and Plan views
command: Manual: open Analytics tab then 30-Day Plan section
expected: Both canvases show identical horizontal task bars aligned to the 28-day scale

feature: Layout collapses to single column side panel below 980px width
expected: Left nav stacks above content and cards span wider grid

feature: Hidden textual reference provides full transcript for accessibility
command: Manual: inspect #full-guide element in DOM or via screen reader
expected: Section contains numbered guidance matching the written transcript while remaining visually hidden
